page.title: 13PARK FARM <ARABLE>
page.content: Park Farm is owned by Mr,Mrs Holloway. Park farm is an arable farm.It has 20 steers and some poultry.Park Farm has 550 acres.The farm grows wheat,barley and potatoes.They have 260 acres of wheat,260 acres of barley and 30 acres of potatoes they have three sheds of machinery. Mr,Holloway has about 15 machines to work on the farm. Altogether he has 7 tractors.He has some wood land where he breeds some pheasant he has a net round it to stop them getting out. They harvest the wheat and barley in July and August.After which they burn the stubble and plough the fields before replanting.Potatoes are planted in spring and harvested in October. They get most of their seed from last years grain but they also get some grain from a supplier.
